    Wisconsin Diagnostic Breast Cancer (WDBC).

    wdbc.data.Rd

    A dataset containing diagnosis (Malign/benign) for 569 patients with breast cancer and features extracted from tumor imaging.

    Usage

    wdbc.data

    Format

    A data frame with 569 rows and 12 variables:

    person_id

    ID number.

    diagnosis

    M = malignant, B = benign

    radius

    Mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter

    texture

    Standard deviation of gray-scale values.

    perimeter

    Computed perimeter

    area

    see doc

    smoothness

    local variation in radius lengths

    compactness

    perimeter^2 / area - 1.0

    concavity

    Severity of concave portions of the contour

    concave_points

    Number of concave portions of the contour

    symmetry

    see doc

    fractal_dimension

    "coastline approximation" - 1

    compactness_binary

    Factor containing binarized compactness (threshold=0.1). Additional toy parameter.

    compactness_quartile

    Factor containing compactness divided in quartiles. Additional toy parameter.

    Source

    https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Breast+Cancer+Wisconsin+(Diagnostic)
